snippet: In a letter to shareholders in advance of its annual meeting, the retailer detailed how it increased information security.
abstract: Target defends its management and oversight of customer data despite extensive hacking it experienced in 2013; in letter to shareholders in advance of its annual meeting, company details how it increased information security since the breach.
lead_paragraph: In a letter to shareholders in advance of its annual meeting, the retailer detailed how it increased information security.

headline.main: Target Gives a Defense of Its Efforts on Security
headline.print_headline: Target Gives a Defense of Its Efforts on Security
